reviewText: Thanks!

Alert! This concert runs about 2 hours, not the 60 minutes reported by Amazon. Great performance by Melissa, but found the sound mix lacking on blu-ray. The snare drum was a loud and annoying distraction throughout. Still give 5 stars overall.
Excellent bluray.  PQ and AQ are very good..  Great song set.
Awesome show. This is a must buy. You will not be disappointed.

Right now I'm so jazzed I feel like dancing all night! I can't imagine how high my adrenaline level could go if I ever saw Melissa perform in person! This DVD with accompanying CD is one of the best music concerts I've ever seen. I have enjoyed ME' s music for years from a distance - making comparisons to the late Janis Joplin - the original rocker chick - minus some of the vocal gravel. Etheridge has demonstrated on this video what's keeping crowds coming back year after year. I agree with another reviewer's statement that "Monster" should have been included on the CD. This set is definitely a good investment for fans and for those who want to rock out in their homes.

She is so incredible, a perfect show with great sound and picture
2 extra songs that were so long, they couldn't fit on CD
great sound and video
I LOVED THE UP BEAT PLAYFULL NATURE OF THE ALBUM!!! I LOVE EVERY SONG I CANT SAY I HAVE A FAVORITE BECAUSE I LOVE THEM ALL. IF YOU LIKE MELISSA YOU WILL LOVE THIS CONCERT.
It's okay

I saw Melissa in concert in July. The show was so awesome I decided to buy this DVD based on her "A Little Bit of me Tour." The only thing better than this DVD is seeing her person! The energy & enthusiasm she showed on stage comes through on this DVD recorded in L.A.

I highly recommend this DVD for Melissa Etheridge fans. If you get the chance to see her in person, do it!  Melissa still rocks it!
Great video! Melissa plays her new & old songs. I didn't care for the group she had come out and sing with her backup singers. The one girl was absolutely annoying to me but besides that loved it!
Great
CD is great. BlueRay disc is area/zone code A: not playable outside USA! I live in Europe, so I'm not able to play it!

I went to this show so I was very interested in seeing the DVD from that night.  The DVD is great but I was disappointed that several of my favorite songs had been cut.  I pre-ordered it and at that time they did not have a song list online so I didn't get to see what was on it until I watched it.  It is nice that they also included the audio version on CD as well as the DVD of the show. Well worth the money.
Classic and listenable-crank it up!
It's about time that she put out a show with her hit songs. Very clear picture and great Audio. Better late then never.
Great concert! Great price!
Great concert.  Arrived on time, in excellent condition, and would purchase again.
Love it!
had no idea she was so gifted with a variety of instruments.
Great live concert! A must for any Melissa fan.
This is a pretty good replacement for the one I bought right after it came out that I accidentally gave away.
Does not play
Wow! Very brilliant and sharp! High quality! Makes you feel like you're right there. Excellent performance! Will probably end up buying more for friends as birthday presents.
A great concert of Melissa. A perfect sound, image and lots of powerfull. Perfect job. The blu-ray arrive just in time. Thank you. Ablio

This is the first Melissa album I have purchased and I am glad I did.  I am not a hard rock fan so I choose my rock albums very carefully.  This album satisfies the type of rock music I enjoy.  Great melodic music. Now that I know what to expect I will follow her music more closely.
